archimate:Node.name: [Base Site FS] Base OOS Site File System (Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: Thie file system holds data that has been recently acquired any of the three archivers supporting the LSST cameras. The file system needs to be avaiable whenever the archiving function is needed. The system needs to have sufficient performance to handle the maximum archiving rate of all deployed cameras, the ingesed data are sent to the Data Backbone proper, plus a margin for exposing files to the commisisoning cluster and other observatory.
